Quickstrike:



Quickstrike bent down closer to Dark Mouse's face, with a surly look 
in his bright glowing optics. "Well," he said harshly, but not loud 
enough so the others could hear. "Lyin' might be th' only chance ya 
got! Dang it, ah had to do that. Ah coulda been kill'd. Sure, 
Megatron usually don't listen, but ya might as well slaggin' TRY! At 
least ya could get some wounds to tell yer story. Ya jus' listen t' 
me, go along an' watch yer tail. Ya hear me? If Megatron asks, ah got 
it handled!"
